page.title: 08LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: Guernsey was occupied by German forces on the 30th June 1940 .A programme for the permanent fortification of Guernsey was introduced a year later .In this area of Guernsey there was a 3.7cm anti-aircraft battery , an 8.8cm anti-aircraft battery and 4 resistence nests.Also in this area there was a strong point,which was an area set up on high ground over looking costal sectors.All this effort proved in vain ,however.In May,1945,having been isolated for almost a year the Germans forces finally surrendered.
